Articles.Content:
So, here we go. Create a vehicle that can be driven on the ground all the way to the ocean, function as a boat when it gets in the water and then launch a plane from the vehicle while it floats.

Extra Challenges: Make a vehicle that can return to the ground from the ocean and go back prior to take off.

Land your plane back on the deck of your boat.

Make the plane a seaplane that can also land in the water and take of again safely.

Arm your plane with missiles/torpedoes and sink your boat.

So, here we go. Create a vehicle that can be driven on the ground all the way to the ocean, function as a boat when it gets in the water and then launch a plane from the vehicle while it floats.

Extra Challenges: Make a vehicle that can return to the ground from the ocean and go back prior to take off.

Land your plane back on the deck of your boat.

Make the plane a seaplane that can also land in the water and take of again safely.

Arm your plane with missiles/torpedoes and sink your boat.

i did that back in .14

Here is a rather ugly one with none of the extras.
